mapper.insert: insert into user(uid, password, name, email, profile, access_img, created_time) value (#{uid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{profile}, #{accessImg}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where uid = #{id} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, profile = #{profile}, access_img = #{accessImg} where uid = #{uid}
update user set refreshToken = #{refreshToken} where uid = #{id}
mapper.select: select refreshToken from user where uid = #{id}
